wikipedia_page.main: Robert McIlvenny (7 July 1926 – 15 May 2016), was a Northern Irish footballer who played as an inside forward in the Football League. He made 139 league appearances with Oldham Athletic where he scored 36 goals.McIlvenny died on 15 May 2016 at Millbrook House in Exeter at the age of 89.McIlvenny's older brother Paddy also played in the Football League. Their father, also a Paddy McIlvenny, was an Ireland international footballer.

response: * 7 July – Bobby McIlvenny, Northern Irish footballer (died 2016)
* 15 May 2016: Bobby McIlvenny, 89, Oldham Athletic, Bury, Southport and Barrow inside forward.
*Bobby McIlvenny, 89, Northern Irish footballer (Oldham Athletic).Robert McIlvenny (1926–2016)
